summary: I HAVE THE STARTING ISSUE LIKE OTHERS. THE ENGINE DOES NOT START. SOMETIMES IT STARTS BY ITSELF AFTER A WHILE, SOMETIMES I HAVE TO PUT THE GEAR IN N/D AND BACK TO P AND TRY. IN ADDITION, SOMETIMES THE WINDOWS GO UP AND DOWN BY THEMSELVES! I HAVE SEEN MANY PEOPLE HAVE THE SAME ISSUE WITH THIS MODEL. PLEASE INVESTIGATE IT AND MAKE IT AS A RECALL!
